issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

components.name: Clients
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with CLI, Webclient, JDBC clients or other such clients.

fields.description:
*Here is three sql:*

*1:*

*MERGE INTO transactions AS T* 
 *USING merge_source AS S*
 *ON T.id = S.id*
 *WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET name='update' ;*

*2:***

*MERGE INTO transactions AS T* 
 *USING merge_source AS S*
 *ON T.id = S.id*
 *WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES (S.ID, S.NAME,'321');*

*3:***

*MERGE INTO transactions AS T* 
 *USING merge_source AS S*
 *ON T.id = S.id*
 *WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET name='update'* 
 *WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES (S.ID, S.NAME,'321');*

 

*There is no error log , just the table rows is not expected when i run sql3 , it looks like nothing changed.*

*finally*

*I need use sql1 and sql2 to replace sql3 , and to make sure the table rows is* *expected .***
fields.summary: MERGE INTO SQL not work fully
